name: shopify-frontend-api
author: Tyler King <tyler.king@littlerocket.io>
description: A basic JS/TS library for frontend Shopify API for common tasks.

scripts.build:browser: browserify ./src/index.ts -o dist/sfa.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -p [ tsify ] --standalone SFA && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o dist/sfa.min.js -- dist/sfa.js
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run build:browser
